sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (
SELECT reviewindex, storeunq, rate, rcontent, rimage, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')rdate, userid, oderindex FROM OrderReview ORDER BY reviewindex DESC ) a ) b WHERE rn BETWEEN '$s_no$' AND '$e_no$'
SELECT reviewindex, storeunq, rate, rcontent, rimage, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')rdate, userid, oderindex FROM orderreview WHERE reviewindex = #reviewindex#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE orderreview SET userid = '$userid$', rdate = sysdate, rcontent = '$rcontent$' WHERE reviewindex = '$reviewindex$'
UPDATE orderreview SET hits=hits+1 WHERE reviewindex=#reviewindex#
